name: one breath
description:
Fred found himself lost in the maze-like caves beneath an island he was exploring, can you get him back to his boat before he drowns? 

You can skip the story screen by clicking on it. Watch out for surprise currents! The breath bar will probably go wonky on anything other than 1920 x 1080.  Most of the art is a ‘placeholder’ but stayed in the game due to time constraints. I think I have between 12 to 18 hours in this. This is my first real go at a game and I spent most of those hours watching YouTube videos trying to figure out why nothing was working.
